> **NOTE:** Available in v1.132.0+.

Valid values:  `open-lindorm-engine`, `open-phoenix-engine`, `open-search-engine`, `open-tsdb-engine`,  `upgrade-cold-storage`, `upgrade-disk-size`,  `upgrade-lindorm-core-num`, `upgrade-lindorm-engine`,  `upgrade-search-core-num`, `upgrade-search-engine`, `upgrade-tsdb-core-num`, `upgrade-tsdb-engine`.

## Look up an Existing Instance Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing Instance resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.
{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% choosable language nodejs %}}

## Import


Lindorm Instance can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import alicloud:lindorm/instance:Instance example <id>
```
